item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1670; 09:09PM; 2127 S Malcolm Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FklTow; West Los Angeles; It took 24 firefighters 23 minutes to fully extinguish flames that consumed a detached garage and nearby carport. Firefighters saved one canine from the burning building. No reported injuries. title.a: Update Multi-Patient Medical Suspected Overdose 12/01/2022 INC#0643

item.description: Update Suspected Overdose Multi-Patient Medical; INC#0643; 12:33PM; 5435 N Vesper Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GYWbY4; #ShermanOaks; A total of 10 students (12-15 years old) were evaluated at Van Nuys Middle School for suspected overdose and found to be in mild-to-moderate distress. Seven were transported to local hospitals specializing in pediatric medicine, and three were released on scene. With 50 firefighters on scene, in coordination with LA School Police and school personnel, crews systematically searched the entire school premises including hallways, classrooms, offices, and recreation areas to ensure there were no students unaccounted for. Crews on scene confirmed that this was NOT fentanyl-related. Specifics of the medical complaints and possible substance(s) used will be completed by hospital personnel.; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; AP58 AP65 AP7 BC10 BC14 CM40 CM41 CM42 E102 E288 E290 E293 E81 E88 E99 EM10 EM14 EM9 PI1 RA27 RA59 RA70 RA71 RA76 RA81 RA84 RA87 RA88 RA90 T88 T90 T93; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

PIO Captain Erik Scott is en route, ETA 11:50am.; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC10 BC14 CM40 CM42 E102 E288 E290 E293 E81 E88 E99 EM10 EM14 EM9 RA27 RA59 RA70 RA71 RA76 RA81 RA84 RA87 RA88 RA90 T88 T90 T93; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

title.a: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire #RandallFire 11/30/2022 INC#0123

item.description: Update #RandallFire Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0123; 03:30AM; 10930 W Randall St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Vlry3j; #ShadowHills; 104 LAFD personnel remain in defensive firefighting operations at what is known as the "Randall Fire", the blaze currently involves *one* 50' x 150' one-story commercial structure with fire through the roof, as well as parked vehicles and a large amount of vegetation and debris, with flames threatening at least two adjacent commercial structures. The firefight continues with no injuries reported.; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; AR1 BC12 BC14 BC15 BC5 CM40 CM42 EA1 E239 E24 E260 E27 E274 E288 E289 E293 E298 E60 E73 E75 E77 E87 E89 EM14 EM15 HE2 HR3 RA77 RA89 RA98 RS3 T39 T60 T74 T88 T89 T93 T98 UR27 UR88; CH9; 13 17; Brian Humphrey
